title: How Many Calories in Grits?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in grits per cup serving, including carbs, protein, fat breakdown, and simple tweaks for different preparations.
assumptions: Plain corn grits cooked in water without salt, butter, or other additions; 1 cup serving weighs approximately 158 g.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by grits type (e.g., stone-ground vs. instant), brand, cooking method, and any added ingredients like butter or cheese. Check product labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One cup of plain cooked grits has about 112 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged products.

tweaks.label: Cooked with 1% milk instead of water
Instant grits with added salt and flavoring

faqs.q: How many calories in one cup of grits?
faqs.a: About 112 kcal for plain cooked grits without additions.
Yes, plain cooked grits have only 0.5 g fat per cup.
Roughly 2.4 g protein per cup of plain cooked grits.
Yes, about 1.5 g dietary fiber per cup from the corn.

faqs.q: What makes grits higher in calories?
faqs.a: Additions like butter, cheese, or cooking in milk increase calories significantly.
